meanings.definition: A device for recording and playing back video images.
meanings.sent1: My videorecorder lets me watch movies at home.
meanings.sent2: I bought a new videorecorder to capture family memories.
meanings.sent3: The videorecorder decided to rewind the movie on its own!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a videorecorder, capturing every detail of the scene.
meanings.sent5: The videorecorder hummed softly as it recorded the live concert.

meanings.definition: To record video images using a videorecorder.
meanings.sent1: I will videorecorder the school play for everyone to see.
meanings.sent2: She videorecorders all our family vacations to share with relatives.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to videorecorder the birds outside the window.
meanings.sent4: His memory videorecorded the joyful moment forever.
meanings.sent5: The videorecorder faithfully captured the beauty of the sunset.
